originalText.text: Dr. Ivanov and his staff have been wonderful! I’ve felt truly taken care of as a patient, and am always able to reach someone if I need. I feel lucky to have found Dr. Ivanov! He is professional, very knowledgeable , and kind. He listens to what’s happening and never discounts what I say or feel. I highly recommend!

text.text: Dr. Ivanov and his staff have been wonderful! I’ve felt truly taken care of as a patient, and am always able to reach someone if I need. I feel lucky to have found Dr. Ivanov! He is professional, very knowledgeable , and kind. He listens to what’s happening and never discounts what I say or feel. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Outstanding doctor he has been treating me for almost half a year now. My whole life has changed, and my perspective as a whole about life has changed since I’ve been treated by Dr. Ivanov. I could not have asked for a better psychiatrist. He cares so much about his patients. Such a great listener and he does not judge you or anything you talk about. His secretary is so nice she is very easy to talk to and arrange appointments with. Very organized. He is a very busy professional and he makes his times available even at night. He is very committed to providing exceptional care to people who really need help. He is not working in psychiatry just for the money. We need more Drs like him in New York.

originalText.text: Dr Zlatin is amazing doctor and a true professional. He truly cares about his patients. I am having an amazing experience. He has help me get my life back on track. Dr Ivanov cares and works with all your needs and  so does his team from his assistant to the front desk representative everyone is effective and provides the best patient experience. I am grateful.

originalText.text: Finding out I got depression was even more depressing, but relieving at the same time. Dr. Ivanov I met on the Online Psychiatrists platform was very caring and supportive and both online appointments and medication allow me to feel much better. It is very hard work, but feeling the difference motivates me not to give up. I love that I can opt for weekends or evening sessions which makes the therapy accessible and doesn’t add up more stress to book one.  I haven’t seen anyone offering the same level of service online in New York, so I can definitely recommend his services.

originalText.text: Their service is top-notch! It's easy to book appointments, get prescription refills, and they offer flexible scheduling. Plus, they're super responsive to emails. I'd give them an A+ and highly recommend their services!
